name: REACTOR 21
description:
Create powerfull and (hopefully) stable reactors to complete the challenges.

This is not a true simulation just a fun representasion of a real reactor.
For me one of the most fun part of factory/building games is creating a complicated yet stable system. I wanted to explore how to build a game with such a sytem and here it is.

Please note, The challenges/game will be reballanced and added to once i get a better idea of how hard people find it.(or if people even play it)

All feedback is very welcome.

Enjoy
